text: The Porter aka Moonnam Loka Pattalam is a 1996 Malayalam film directed by Padmakumar Vaikom, starring Abi and Maathu. ==Cast== * Abi as Sasi Varma * Maathu as Gopika * Kalabhavan Mani as Xavi * Sankaradi as Ezhuthachan Panikkar * Baburaj as Karimpattakaran Kochekkan * Bindu Varappuzha as Athira * Indrans as Prashna Kumaran * Kalabhavan Narayanankutty as Kochappi * Kanakalatha as Sasi's mother * Kanya Bharathi as Shalini * Karamana Janardanan Nair as Rama Varma * Machan Varghese as Earupadakkam * Mini Arun as Latha * Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Rajasekhara Varma * Jose Pallisseri as Kunjunni Kurup * Paravoor Bharathan as Ugrasenan * Philomina as Muthassi * KPAC Lalitha as Ammini Ammayi * Spadikam George as Antappan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: The Porter (1994 film)
